alert.note: Alert for Colbert; Lauderdale; Lawrence (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 03 at 11:51PM CST by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Lauderdale, east central Colbert and north central Lawrence Counties through 1215 AM CST... At 1150 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sheffield, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Florence, Muscle Shoals, Sheffield, Tuscumbia, Killen, St. Florian, Underwood-Petersville, Northwest Alabama Regional Airport, Center Star and Kingtown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CST for northwestern Alabama.
